seo.defaultTitle: Website Dev Agency | Fast Performance | Swagatam Tech
seo.defaultDescription: Website development agency building fast performance websites for business growth. We built high-performance websites with strategy, UX design, and development focused on leads, conversions, and measurable growth. 10+ projects, 98% satisfaction.

hero.title: Website Development Agency
hero.titleHighlight: Fast Performance Websites Built for Business Growth
hero.description: We are a {websiteDevelopmentAgency} that grows your business. We craft high-performance {websites} with strategy, UX, and development focused on leads, conversions, and measurable growth — not vanity design. Explore our {portfolio} to see 10+ projects delivered with 98% client satisfaction, or check out our {caseStudies} for detailed results.

card.quickLook: A quick look at our track record.
card.basedOn: Based on completed projects, repeat clients and long-term partnerships across different industries.

services.title: Website Development Services Built for Fast Performance and Business Growth
services.description: From concept to a fully launched {website}, we partner with you at every stage. Explore our {portfolio} to see completed projects, or check our {caseStudies} for detailed results.

caseStudies.title: A few websites we've designed and built for growing brands.
caseStudies.description: From marketing sites to product dashboards, we partner with teams to launch fast, responsive and SEO-friendly websites that actually move the numbers—load time, conversion and revenue.

testimonials.title: Brands that build with us
testimonials.description: From the first kickoff call to post-launch support — our clients trust us to deliver websites that are fast, beautiful, and built to convert. Here's what they have to say.

whyChoose.title: Website Development Agency Built for Fast Performance and Business Growth
whyChoose.description: We don't just design {websites}. We think like product owners, marketers, and engineers — building {websites2} that load fast, convert visitors, and support real business growth. See our {caseStudies} for examples.
whyChoose.launchesDesc: Static sites, CMS and e-commerce projects.
whyChoose.speedFirstDesc: Clean code with Core Web Vitals in mind.
whyChoose.longTermDesc: Clients return for updates and new launches.

contact.title: Let's build a website that works
contact.description: Tell us about your product, goals, and what success looks like. We'll review it and get back within one business day with clear next steps.
contact.timeline: Most website projects are designed, built and launched in
contact.heroSubtitle: Fast Performance Websites Built for Business
contact.heroDescription: Let's talk about what you're building. Tell us where you are today and what you're trying to achieve. At Swagatam Tech, we help teams plan and build modern, high-performance {websites} with clear goals and realistic timelines. Explore our {portfolio} and {caseStudies} to see our {webDevelopment} work. Get a free website plan today.
contact.planningBadge: Planning a new website or an improvement?
contact.pageTitle: Website Development Services Built for Fast Performance
contact.pageDescription: Whether you're starting from scratch or improving an existing site, we'll help you prioritize what matters most and outline a clear path forward.
contact.emailDirectly: You can also email us directly at
contact.briefDescription: Paste the key details in the form or share a document or link — whatever's easiest.
contact.formProjectType: What are you looking to build?
contact.formMessagePlaceholder: Share where your current website is today (or if you don't have one) and what you'd like it to achieve in the next 3–6 months.
contact.formPrivacy: Swagatam Tech will only use your details to respond to this inquiry. No newsletters, no spam.
contact.formErrorRetry: Failed to submit form. Please try again.

portfolio.heroSubtitle: Fast Performance Websites We Built for Business Growth
portfolio.heroDescription: Work we've shipped for teams that value clarity and performance. A selected set of {websites} and digital products built across SaaS, e-commerce, non-profits, and service businesses. Each {project} started with a clear goal — speed, usability, or maintainability — and shipped with those priorities in mind. For detailed results, see our {caseStudies}.
portfolio.showingProjects: Showing {count} projects across SaaS, e-commerce and fintech.
portfolio.readyToStart: Ready to start your next website project?
portfolio.finalDescription: Share what you're building, who it's for and what success looks like. We'll come back with a clear plan, rough timeline and recommended starting point.

about.heroSubtitle: Built for Fast Performance and Business Growth
about.heroDescription: We're a small, senior team focused on building high-performance {websites} that become revenue engines. Design, development and growth engineered for modern brands. We're a modern {webDevelopmentAgency} shaped by developers, designers and builders who care more about outcomes than buzzwords. See our {work} and {caseStudies} to understand our approach.
about.storyTitle: Website Development Agency Built in 2024 — Fast Performance Websites for Business Growth
about.storyDescription1: Born in 2024, we're a modern {webStudio} shaped by developers, designers and builders who care more about outcomes than buzzwords. In just a short time, we've helped ambitious founders and growing brands turn rough ideas into polished, {conversionReadyWebsites}. Browse our {portfolio} to see examples of our {websiteDevelopment} work.
about.storyDescription2: We started this {websiteDevelopmentAgency} because we kept seeing the same problems: slow timelines, bloated quotes, agencies that talk more than they ship. We flipped the script — lean execution, clear communication and accountability that feels like having an internal team. Our {webDevelopmentServices} focus on results, not just pretty designs.
about.philosophy: Our philosophy is simple: do work that matters, with people who care. Strategy first, execution second. Fast launches, measurable results.
about.clientsDesc: SaaS, D2C, agencies & growing service brands.
about.collaborationDesc: Weekly check-ins, async updates, clear scopes.
about.snapshotFooter: No bloat, no endless decks — just a focused team solving real problems in your funnel, your brand and your product story.
about.whoWeAreDesc1: We're a small, senior studio of designers and developers who care about the details most users never consciously notice — the load time before first paint, the spacing in your type, the way a button animates when someone's about to convert.
about.whoWeAreDesc2: We plug into your team like an in-house squad: no agency ego, no big pitch theater. Just a clear roadmap, good communication and a shared obsession with results.
about.strategyBeforeScreensDesc: We align on goals, audience and messaging before pixels move.
about.performanceOverDecorationDesc: Beautiful is useless if it doesn't load fast or convert.
about.transparentCollaborationDesc: You see the roadmap, the progress and the trade-offs in plain language.
about.longTermThinkingDesc: We build with maintainability, SEO and future features in mind.
about.averageBuildTime: Average build time for a new site
about.processTitle: Website Development Process Built for Fast Performance and Business Growth
about.processDescription: No mystery. No disappearing devs. Just a transparent series of steps you can follow — and show your stakeholders.
about.discoveryDesc: We understand your brand, goals, audience and technical realities.
about.structureDesignDesc: We map pages, flows and UI so every section has a clear job.
about.buildIntegrateDesc: We develop a fast, responsive site on modern, SEO-friendly tech.
about.launchGrowDesc: We ship, measure and iterate so the site keeps earning its keep.
about.stackTitle: Website Development Tools Built for Fast Performance Across Devices
about.stackDescription: We work with a focused, modern stack so we're never fighting our tools. Everything we choose is based on speed, security and how easy it is for your team to maintain after handoff.
about.optimisationTech: SEO, performance budgets, accessibility & Core Web Vitals
about.idealPartner1: SaaS founders who need a site that matches their product.
about.idealPartner2: Service businesses leveling up from a DIY or outdated site.
about.idealPartner3: D2C brands focused on product storytelling & conversion.
about.idealPartner4: Agencies that need a reliable white-label web team.
about.idealPartnersFooter: If that sounds like you, we'll likely be a very good fit.
about.ctaTitle: Website Development Built for Fast Performance and Business Growth
about.ctaDescription: Share where you are today, where you want to be, and we'll map out the simplest, highest-impact version of your next website.

blogs.readyToDiscuss: Ready to discuss your website project?
blogs.ctaDescription: If something here sparked an idea or raised a question, feel free to reach out. Share a bit about what you're exploring and we'll help you think through the next steps.
blogs.metaTitle: Blog - Web Design & Development Insights | Swagatam Tech
blogs.metaDescription: Learn from real website projects. Practical insights on web design, development, performance, and SEO from building conversion-focused websites. Real projects, not theory.
